metadata.title: CVE-2013-4234 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple heap-based buffer overflows in the (1) abc_MIDI_drum and (2)abc_MIDI_gchord functions in load_abc.cpp in libmodplug 0.8.8.4 and earlierallow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption andcrash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted ABC.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4234` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmodplug1 - 1:0.8.8.5-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmodplug package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.8.8.5-2').
